front: Only mammal that can truly fly
Largest animal to have ever existed on Earth
Only bird that can fly backwards
Sleeps up to 22 hours a day
Has three hearts and blue blood
Can rotate its head 270 degrees
Fingerprints are nearly identical to humans
Only mammal with scales
Can sleep while standing up
Has the longest migration of any animal (71,000 km annually)
Cannot physically vomit
Heart is the size of a small car
Only venomous primate
Can hold its breath for up to 2 hours underwater
Has rectangular pupils
Can change sex from female to male
Produces milk that is pink
Has the strongest bite force of any animal
Only animal that cannot jump
Tongue weighs as much as an elephant
Can see ultraviolet light
Spends 90% of its life asleep
Has no vocal cords and communicates by stomping
Can survive being frozen solid
Only mammal that lays eggs
Can run faster than a horse over short distances
Has the largest eyes of any land animal
Can regenerate its entire body from a tiny fragment
Never stops growing throughout its entire life
Has 32 brains
